home.headline: Software Engineer and Backend Application Developer
home.subline: I'm {name}, a design engineer at SecureWorks, where I develop backend APIs, messaging data pipelines, and cloud/k8s infrastructure. After hours, I build my own projects and work on my homelab (where this site is hosted).

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: {name} is a US-based engineer with a passion for transforming complex challenges into robust and modular services. His work spans cloud infrastructure, container orchestration, backend APIs, and Kafka microservices.

SecureWorks.achievements: Specialized in developing web service APIs, high-throughput data pipelines, and software development kits to deliver actionable security insights and drive advancements in cybersecurity.

WalMart Global Tech.achievements: Developed and deployed a back-end server for a payroll API using Java Spring Boot and SQL, improving operational reliability and speed while migrating infrastructure from virtual machines to Kubernetes for enhanced scalability

University of Arkansas.description: Studied Computer Science and Computer Engineering with a course focus in Information Retrieval.
University of Arkansas.result: A Bachelors of Science and graduating with high distinction and 3.9 GPA.

Go, Java Spring/Springboot, Python.description: Building fault tolerant and scalable backend web and data services. Experience with RESTful APIs, gRPC, and GraphQL.

Kubernetes, Docker.description: Container orchestration and microservices deployment using Helm and Helmfile as IaC.

Apache Kafka, Spark, Flink, StarRocks.description: Developing high-throughput data pipelines and stream processing applications.

AWS, GCP.description: Cloud infrastructure and services, including EC2, S3, RDS, EKS, GKE, and Cloud Functions.

SQL, NoSQL, Graph Databases.description: Database design and management, including MySQL, PostgreSQL Redis, and Janusgraph.
